channel.title: 317 new land of elements
channel.description:
[size=24pt][u][b]Land Of Elements [/b][/u][/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJJwnZQPq3s[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJJwnZQPq3s[/youtube]
Nomad Friendly Staff Acheivements Price Checker Grand Exchange Full Screen 317 Loads 600+ Custom yell channels Rent a center (get temp rares or items for x amount of hours)
Amazingly smooth AGS spec Spectacular Dragon claws spec Smooth Korasi Spec Saradomin Sword Smooth Effects Customaziable home Custom Tabs Nex boss drops (torva, pernix, etc.) Godwars(Bandos,sara,zammy,etc) Fun minigame's
Player panel(Time played, Points, etc) Cash Store (piggybank, holds more) Storage Donator Panel Prestige Added(soon) Custom Shops Donator island (custom) Skiller Shop Summoning Shop
Clan Chat with working lootshare Weekly Updates Open suggestions Dicing only for trusted rank Active forums Challanging Skill's Working duel arena Events Every Weekend
We have 2 sources so choose what you wish to play there is a SPAWNPK which everything is spawnable besides rare and claws and what not but AGS is spawnable. Also the other source is a full out eco with a stable economy
WWW.Landofelements.com/smf
Will post pictures soon

item.title: 317 new land of elements
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

I will provide pictures after thanks and you need to learn how to read. It just outlines what there is. These hardly attract players anyways lol

I read it all, i know you said you are going to add pictures soon but why not add them when you make the thread.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 new land of elements
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

I will provide pictures after thanks and you need to learn how to read. It just outlines what there is. These hardly attract players anyways lol

You’re right, these types of advertisements, with no pictures, hardly attract players. However, advertisement threads with pictures and or videos, a little info on the server, and a detailed list in order on what you’re able to do on the server will get players to join. Just listing random things will not.

Edit: Just a little advice for your future, have images and or videos before posting the thread. I’m sure you’ve already lost peoples interest by not having them.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

This advertisement is horrible.

It’s very unorganized and don’t even make a advertisement thread if you don’t post pictures.

Anyways good luck with your server

Read full topic
